```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(dendextend)
trip_data <- read_csv('C:/Users/jonathan/Desktop/DAPT Docs/spring 2019/Statistics/stat_assignments_spring19_R/stat_assignment3_R/data/tripadvisor_review.csv')
```

```{r hierarchical}
trip_dist <- dist(trip_data[,2:11],method="euclidean")
trip_hclust <- hclust(trip_dist,method="ward.D")
plot(trip_hclust, labels = FALSE)
groups <- cutree(trip_hclust,k=5)
rect.hclust(trip_hclust,k=5,border="red")
aggregate(trip_data[,2:11],list(groups),FUN=mean)

```

```{r hierarchical dendextend}
dend <- trip_data[,2:11] %>% 
  dist %>% 
  hclust(method="ward.D") %>% 
  as.dendrogram %>% 
  set("labels_cex", .01)
  plot(dend)
  rect.dendrogram(dend, k=2)



```
